title: The Starbucks CEO recognizes the prank of angry customers in Satanism.
subtitle: One of the arguments about Holliday's cups was that Executive Director Howard Schultz admitted that he was using the design of the new cup to lure customers to the dark side.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz admitted that he was using the design of the "Cop Holliday" series to lure customers into Satanic.
